title: HashQParserPlugin should trim partition keys
description: Currently the HashQParserPlugin doesn't trim the partition keys, so having spaces in the comma delimited list of keys causes an NPE while loading the field from the schema.

comments.author: Joel Bernstein
comments.content: Small patch for this. Since this is such a small fix I plan to commit fairly quickly so it can make it into the 6.1 release.
